title: US F-15 down in Kuwait? Iran shares video showing fighter jet engulfed in flames, pilots ejecting
summary_full: US F-15 Fighter Jet Crash: An American F-15 fighter jet crashed in Kuwait amid escalating Middle East tensions following the killing of Iran's Supreme Leader. While Iran's state media claimed the jet was shot down, the exact cause remains unconfirmed. Both crew members reportedly survived and were handed over to Kuwaiti authorities
